dialogue.htmlContent:
Zaranix staggers back, reaching out to grab hold of the edge of a nearby table as he pants, [zaranix.speech(Please! No more!)]

It's quite clear that he's completely unable to continue fighting any longer, so, [pc.stepping] forwards, you make your demands known, [pc.speech(You're going to hand over Arthur now, understood?)]

[zaranix.speech(F-Fine...)] he sighs, understanding that he has little choice in the matter, [zaranix.speech(You heard the [pc.race], Arthur, you're free to go...)]

Arthur, up until now having been hiding behind one of the laboratory's cabinets, slowly stands up and exclaims, [arthur.speech(Bloody hell! Well, you're certainly letting me go easily! Not that I should be complaining...)]

[zaranix.speech(If it were anyone else, I'd have refused to let you go, but I just realised who this [pc.race] is,)] Zaranix says, stepping back and collapsing down into a nearby chair. [zaranix.speech([pc.SheIs] the [pc.race] who's moved in with Lilaya... Yes, I know who you are. I may not get out much, but I still keep my ear close to the grapevine.)]

By this time already half-way across the room towards the door, Arthur stops to once again exclaim, [arthur.speech(Bloody hell! So it's Lilaya who's behind this rescue? The last I heard, oh, what was it now... Oh yes! She was going to 'blast me into a million pieces, or banish me into an alternate dimension' the next time she saw me. I mean, considering that nobody's managed to travel between dimensions before, I couldn't quite take her threat seriously, but she did seem to be pretty angry. Maybe I'd be better off staying he-)]

[zaranix.speech(Be quiet Arthur!)] Zaranix shouts, [zaranix.speech(I may have wealth and a modicum of power in this city, but having never been recognised by my Lilin mother, I'd be a fool to stand against the wishes of a demon who has. And it's not just any demon! Hah! Lyssieth's precious little half-demon herself! So go on, get out of here!)]

[arthur.speech(Well, when you put it like that... Maybe I'll see you around Zaranix. It wasn't too bad living here, all things considered,)] Arthur says, before turning to you and stating, [arthur.speech(I'll go on ahead, so I suppose I'll see you over at Lilaya's place.)]

With that, he steps past you and makes his hasty exit, leaving you alone in the lab with the defeated incubus. You wonder if you should take advantage of his weakened state, or simply turn around and leave...

[pc.speech(You made me go through a lot of trouble to find Arthur,)] you say, stepping towards the exhausted [zaranix.race], [pc.speech(I think you owe me an apology...)]

Despite the fact that [zaranix.sheIs] a powerful demon, [zaranix.name] lets out a lewd little sigh as [zaranix.she] looks up into your [pc.eyes]. Your strong arcane aura is quite clearly having a profound effect on [zaranix.herHim], and as you approach, [zaranix.she] pleads, [zaranix.speech(Please! Let me make it up to you!)]

Grinning down at [zaranix.name], you prepare to have some fun...

You weren't really expecting it to be so easy to convince [zaranix.name] to part with Arthur, and subsequently feeling a little guilty for fighting [zaranix.herHim] in [zaranix.her] own house, you decide to try and make it up to [zaranix.herHim]. Looking down at [zaranix.her] crotch and biting your [pc.lip], you let out a pleading little whine, [pc.speech(Sorry for all this trouble, [zaranix.name]... Perhaps you'd like me to do something for you...)]

[zaranix.Name] looks up at you, a big grin spreading across [zaranix.her] face as [zaranix.she] realises what it is you want. Standing up, [zaranix.she] steps over towards you, before running [zaranix.her] hands over your [pc.hips] and around to give your [pc.ass+] a firm squeeze. I want to hear you call out my name as I fuck you!)]

Now that Arthur's been rescued, you realise that you should probably head over to Lilaya's house to find out what your next step will be...

#IF(!pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, false))

You can't continue fighting any longer, and after letting out a defeated groan, you stagger backwards and slump down against one wall of Zaranix's lab. Glancing up at your conqueror, you see the imposing form of the huge incubus towering over you with a stern expression on his face.

[zaranix.speech(So, you thought you'd barge into my lab, pick a fight, and get away with it?!)] he scolds you, [zaranix.speech(Instead of simply throwing you out, I had plans to make you into a test subject, but seeing as you've got your mouth all blocked like that, I guess I'll have to forget that plan...)]
